author: @mistflower5945
text:
God help me.. the CRINGE..
I know I'm like a gazillion years late, but I need to list out these moments to gain some closure.
Kai at 0:21 WTF That is not a goddamn wolf. Play Catwoman's signature "Meeow" and it would fit like a match made in heaven.
0:31 If looks could kill. Chen looks good there. Wolf concept believable. Especially with the hair. Speaking of which, KAI'S HAIR I WANT TO CRY. How did this ever happen??
0:33 Xiumin looks like a Halloween themed dumpling. 
0:39 Tao has a convincing snarl. I like it.
0:41 The red eyes are scary. He goes from "Don't mess with this kitten" to "I'LL RIP YOU APART." Not comfortable.
0:44 That's just terrifying.
0:47 Angry puppy. Cute XD
Okay that feels much better. Now I'm positive about which parts I like and dislike about this.

EDIT: Also, SM WHAT THE FUCK WERE YOU THINKING???

author: @teamLNearMello
text:
I'm a bit saddened that so many of you are laughing at their hard work. It's different and unexpected, but I personally enjoy their extension into something like this. It makes me anticipate what the video itself is going to be like, since I'm imagining something intense already. I didn't/don't find it laughable, and I certainly don't think they will disappoint.

Congratulations on the comeback, EXO! I wish you all good health and success during this time and for many more years to come.  XOXO

The biggest foreigner group, the approximately 610,000 Chinese people in South Korea, fell right on that average, with a 2.7% crime rate.
The second-biggest group, the 127,000 Americans in the country, had a crime rate of 1.6%.
The third-biggest group, Vietnamese, with 103,000 people in South Korea – stood at 2.6%.
What group of foreigners had the highest crime rate? The approximately 30,000 Mongolians in South Korea, with just over 1,800 charged with a crime in 2010, for a rate of 6%.

text: I think it's a little over-exaggerating to say that EXO is becoming a "laughing stock" >.> This is just the personality of the fandom, and it is all in good humor. Ofc there are those who make fun of them maliciously, but that's obviously a minority.

author: @TheRealSchenni
text:
I don't know why EXO fans are freaking out so much. Yes, there are people who are making fun of this, but what did you expect? People tend to ridicule and make fun of things that are different and new. They did the same with the 'Dream Girl' concept, but it became such a hit. Give it some time. EXO is doing something new and that's the reason why they'll stand out from the other comebacks. Wait for the song and actual MV, you'll see.
Personally, I'm really excited about this concept!
